zh-cn: 法因娜·伊帕季耶芙娜·瓦赫列娃

death_place.zh-cn: 中华民国台北市北投区台北荣民总医院
death_place.en: Taipei Veterans General Hospital, Beitou District, Taipei, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 白俄罗斯裔中华民国第一夫人，中华民国前总统蒋经国的妻子。本名法因娜·伊帕季耶芙娜·瓦赫列娃，出生于俄罗斯帝国奥尔沙。1935年与蒋经国在苏联结婚，后随夫返回中国。1978年至1988年间担任中华民国第一夫人，但生活低调，鲜少公开露面。
description.en: Belarusian-born First Lady of the Republic of China, wife of former ROC President Chiang Ching-kuo. Born Faina Ipatyevna Vakhreva in Orsha, Russian Empire. She married Chiang Ching-kuo in the Soviet Union in 1935 and later returned to China with him. She served as the First Lady of the Republic of China from 1978 to 1988, but lived a low-profile life with few public appearances.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第六、七任总统，蒋方良的丈夫，蒋中正与毛福梅之子。
description.en: The 6th and 7th President of the Republic of China, husband of Jiang Fangliang, and son of Chiang Kai-shek and Mao Fumei.

en: First Lady of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统配偶的头衔。
description.en: The title of the spouse of the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国人物，蒋方良的前任中华民国第一夫人。
description.en: A figure in the Republic of China, Jiang Fangliang's predecessor as the First Lady of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国人物，蒋方良的继任中华民国第一夫人。
description.en: A figure in the Republic of China, Jiang Fangliang's successor as the First Lady of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 白俄罗斯维捷布斯克州的一座城市，蒋方良的出生地。
description.en: A city in Vitebsk Region, Belarus, the birthplace of Jiang Fangliang.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国与蒋方良的长子。
description.en: The eldest son of Chiang Ching-kuo and Jiang Fangliang.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国与蒋方良的女儿。
description.en: The daughter of Chiang Ching-kuo and Jiang Fangliang.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国与蒋方良的次子。
description.en: The second son of Chiang Ching-kuo and Jiang Fangliang.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国与蒋方良的三子。
description.en: The third son of Chiang Ching-kuo and Jiang Fangliang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统，蒋经国的父亲，蒋方良的公公。
description.en: Former President of the Republic of China, father of Chiang Ching-kuo, and father-in-law of Jiang Fangliang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前第一夫人，蒋中正的妻子，蒋方良的婆婆。
description.en: Former First Lady of the Republic of China, wife of Chiang Kai-shek, and mother-in-law of Jiang Fangliang.

description.zh-cn: 蒋经国的生母，蒋方良的婆婆。
description.en: Chiang Ching-kuo's biological mother and Jiang Fangliang's mother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统，在蒋方良逝世后颁发褒扬令。
description.en: Former President of the Republic of China who issued a commendation order after Jiang Fangliang's death.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统对国家或社会有贡献的国民及其事迹所给予的公开表扬。
description.en: A public commendation issued by the President of the Republic of China to citizens for their contributions to the nation or society.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党籍政治人物，曾任立法院院长。在蒋方良告别式上为其灵柩覆盖党旗。
description.en: A KMT politician who served as President of the Legislative Yuan. He covered Jiang Fangliang's coffin with the party flag at her funeral.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党籍政治人物，曾任行政院文化建设委员会主任委员。在蒋方良告别式上为其灵柩覆盖党旗。
description.en: A KMT politician who served as Minister of the Council for Cultural Affairs. She covered Jiang Fangliang's coffin with the party flag at her funeral.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党籍政治人物，曾任海峡交流基金会董事长。在蒋方良告别式上为其灵柩覆盖党旗。
description.en: A KMT politician who served as Chairman of the Straits Exchange Foundation. He covered Jiang Fangliang's coffin with the party flag at her funeral.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党籍政治人物，后任中华民国总统。在蒋方良告别式上为其灵柩覆盖党旗。
description.en: A KMT politician who later became President of the Republic of China. He covered Jiang Fangliang's coffin with the party flag at her funeral.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党籍政治人物，曾任行政院院长。在蒋方良告别式上为其灵柩覆盖国旗。
description.en: A KMT politician who served as Premier of the Republic of China. He covered Jiang Fangliang's coffin with the national flag at her funeral.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，曾任行政院院长。在蒋方良告别式上为其灵柩覆盖国旗。
description.en: A general of the ROC Army who served as Premier of the Republic of China. He covered Jiang Fangliang's coffin with the national flag at her funeral.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党籍政治人物，曾任台湾省政府主席。在蒋方良告别式上为其灵柩覆盖国旗。
description.en: A KMT politician who served as Governor of Taiwan Province. He covered Jiang Fangliang's coffin with the national flag at her funeral.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任司法院院长。在蒋方良告别式上为其灵柩覆盖国旗。
description.en: An ROC politician who served as President of the Judicial Yuan. He covered Jiang Fangliang's coffin with the national flag at her funeral.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，时任副总统。出席蒋方良告别式并致意。
description.en: An ROC politician, then Vice President. Attended Jiang Fangliang's funeral to pay respects.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党籍政治人物，时任党主席。出席蒋方良告别式并致意。
description.en: A KMT politician, then party chairman. Attended Jiang Fangliang's funeral to pay respects.

description.zh-cn: 亲民党籍政治人物，时任党主席。出席蒋方良告别式并致意。
description.en: A People First Party politician, then party chairman. Attended Jiang Fangliang's funeral to pay respects.

description.zh-cn: 新党籍政治人物，时任党主席。出席蒋方良告别式并致意。
description.en: A New Party politician, then party chairman. Attended Jiang Fangliang's funeral to pay respects.

description.zh-cn: 蒋孝章的丈夫，代妻回台湾参与蒋方良的治丧事宜。
description.en: Husband of Chiang Hsiao-chang, who returned to Taiwan on behalf of his wife to attend Jiang Fangliang's funeral affairs.

description.zh-cn: 蒋方良于1935年3月15日与蒋经国结婚，直至1988年蒋经国逝世。
description.en: Jiang Fangliang married Chiang Ching-kuo on March 15, 1935, until his death on January 13, 1988.

description.zh-cn: 蒋方良在蒋经国担任总统期间为中华民国第一夫人。
description.en: Jiang Fangliang was the First Lady of the Republic of China during Chiang Ching-kuo's presidency.

description.zh-cn: 蒋方良接替刘期纯成为中华民国第一夫人。
description.en: Jiang Fangliang succeeded Liu Chi-chun as the First Lady of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 在蒋经国逝世后，蒋方良的第一夫人身份由李登辉总统的夫人曾文惠接续。
description.en: After the death of Chiang Ching-kuo, Jiang Fangliang's role as First Lady was succeeded by Tseng Wen-hui, wife of President Lee Teng-hui.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正是蒋方良的公公。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek was Jiang Fangliang's father-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 宋美龄是蒋方良的婆婆。
description.en: Soong Mei-ling was Jiang Fangliang's mother-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 毛福梅是蒋方良的婆婆，蒋经国的生母，两人曾一同居住且相处良好。
description.en: Mao Fumei was Jiang Fangliang's mother-in-law and Chiang Ching-kuo's biological mother; they lived together and had a good relationship.

description.zh-cn: 在蒋方良的告别式上，时任总统陈水扁亲自出席并颁发褒扬令以示崇念。
description.en: At Jiang Fangliang's funeral, then-President Chen Shui-bian attended in person and issued a commendation order in her memory.

description.zh-cn: 时任总统陈水扁为蒋方良颁发褒扬令。
description.en: Then-President Chen Shui-bian issued a commendation order for Jiang Fangliang.

description.zh-cn: 蒋方良逝世后获中华民国政府颁布褒扬令给予褒扬。
description.en: After her death, Jiang Fangliang was commended with a Presidential Commendation Order by the ROC government.

description.zh-cn: 在蒋方良的告别式上，作为中国国民党四位副主席之一为蒋方良灵柩覆盖党旗。
description.en: At Jiang Fangliang's funeral, as one of the four vice-chairmen of the Kuomintang, covered her coffin with the party flag.

description.zh-cn: 在蒋方良的告别式上，作为中国国民党四位副主席之一为蒋方良灵柩覆盖党旗。
description.en: At Jiang Fangliang's funeral, as one of the four vice-chairmen of the Kuomintang, covered her coffin with the party flag.

description.zh-cn: 在蒋方良的告别式上，作为中国国民党四位副主席之一为蒋方良灵柩覆盖党旗。
description.en: At Jiang Fangliang's funeral, as one of the four vice-chairmen of the Kuomintang, covered her coffin with the party flag.

description.zh-cn: 在蒋方良的告别式上，作为中国国民党四位副主席之一为蒋方良灵柩覆盖党旗。
description.en: At Jiang Fangliang's funeral, as one of the four vice-chairmen of the Kuomintang, covered her coffin with the party flag.

description.zh-cn: 在蒋方良的告别式上为蒋方良灵柩覆盖国旗。
description.en: At Jiang Fangliang's funeral, covered her coffin with the national flag.

description.zh-cn: 在蒋方良的告别式上为蒋方良灵柩覆盖国旗。
description.en: At Jiang Fangliang's funeral, covered her coffin with the national flag.

description.zh-cn: 在蒋方良的告别式上为蒋方良灵柩覆盖国旗。
description.en: At Jiang Fangliang's funeral, covered her coffin with the national flag.

description.zh-cn: 在蒋方良的告别式上为蒋方良灵柩覆盖国旗。
description.en: At Jiang Fangliang's funeral, covered her coffin with the national flag.

description.zh-cn: 出席蒋方良的告别式并到场致意。
description.en: Attended Jiang Fangliang's funeral to pay respects.

description.zh-cn: 出席蒋方良的告别式并到场致意。
description.en: Attended Jiang Fangliang's funeral to pay respects.

description.zh-cn: 出席蒋方良的告别式并到场致意。
description.en: Attended Jiang Fangliang's funeral to pay respects.

description.zh-cn: 出席蒋方良的告别式并到场致意。
description.en: Attended Jiang Fangliang's funeral to pay respects.

description.zh-cn: 俞扬和是蒋方良的女婿。
description.en: Yu Yang-ho is Jiang Fangliang's son-in-law.
